about_the_game:
Zoomageddon: The Birth of Year of the Cat

About the Game

Join the Adventure in Zoomageddon!

Play as an orange cat in a post-apocalyptic world where you collect Mighty Beasts abilities and challenge the Rat King. Inspired by Vampire Survivors, a game that started the Bullet-heaven genre, Zoomageddon is a unique blend of bullet-heaven and base-building mechanics set in a world teeming with mutant animals. As Oyen the cat, uncover the mysteries of Zoomageddon, unlock various buildings, and discover new quirky powers.

Synopsis

In the aftermath of the Zoomageddon, Neo-Pankou has risen from the ashes. Oyen, the Orange Cat, serves in its military to protect against threats beyond the city walls. His mission: to destroy the Rat King’s nest. But as he ventures out, the Trail of Mysteries reveals truths that challenge everything he knows.

The twelve Chinese zodiacs are subtly woven into the story. Each boss Oyen faces represents one of these zodiac animals, adding an intriguing layer of mystery and challenge to his mission!

Key Features

  • Bullet Heaven Combat: Engage in fast-paced, action-packed gameplay reminiscent of Vampire Survivors.

  • Base Building & Procedurally-Generated Dungeon Crawling: Create and customize your base while delving into endless dungeons with unique challenges.

  • Mighty Beasts Abilities: Collect and utilize unique powers from various beasts you encounter.

  • Narrative Storyline with Eastern Zodiac Lore: Discover the story behind each zodiac sign, including the epic tale of how the Rat earned its spot by betraying the Cat.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 13 Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Zoomageddon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Play as Oyen, an orange cat, in a post-apocalyptic world where you collect Zodiac Beasts abilities and challenge the Rat King. Zoomageddon blends bullet-heaven, dungeon roguelike, and base-building mechanics. Uncover story-rich inspired by Chinese Zodiac, unlock building, and discover quirky power!
